assembly

Class Job

  • java.lang.Object
    • assembly.Job

  • public class Job
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Job. A Job is actually 1 car.

      • isCompleted

        public boolean isCompleted()
        Check if the Job(Car) is completed.
        Returns:
        True if all Tasks are fully completed. False if one or more Tasks are not fully completed.
